program codeforces_445A
    implicit none
    integer, parameter :: maxn=100, maxm=100
    integer :: n, m
    character(len=200) :: firstline  ! enough to read first line, even with spaces
    character(len=maxm) :: temp_str
    character(len=maxm), dimension(0:maxn-1) :: ans ! assuming 0-based indexing for compatibility with Java's approach?

    read(*, '(a)') firstline
    read(firstline(1:1),*) n
    read(firstline(2:2),*) m  ! 提取前两个字符作为n和m

    ! 现在循环读取行
    do i = 0, n-1  ! 如果是要0-based的索引，可能需要
        read(*, '(a)') temp_str ! 这会读入整个行到temp_str, 前m个字符有效
        ! 需要处理每个字符到ans(i)
        ! 如果temp_str的长度可变？ Or temp_str is length 100, and the input line can be up to 100 characters.

        character(len=maxm) :: current_line
        current_line = temp_str(1:m)  ! 取前m个字符
        ! 检查是否可能越界，但根据题目条件，每行正好是m字符，所以没问题
        ! 然后，构造出结果行，ans(i)

        character(len=maxm) :: res_str
        res_str = ' '
        do j = 1, m
            character :: c = current_line(j:j)
            if (c == '-') then 
                res_str(j:j) = c
            else 
                if (mod(i + j, 2) ==1) then 
                    res_str(j:j)='W'
                else 
                    res_str(j:j)='B'
                end if
            end if
        end do

        ans(i) = res_str(1:m)
    end do

    ! 最后，输出所有ans的元素
    do i=0, n-1
        print *, trim(ans(i))   ! Or print without trimming?
    end do
end program

program codeforces_445a  
    implicit none  
    integer, parameter :: maxn = 100, maxm = 100  
    integer :: n, m  
    character(len=200) :: firstline
    character(len=maxm), dimension(1:maxn) :: ans  
    integer :: i, j  

    ! Read the first line to get n and m (first two characters)  
    read(*, '(a)') firstline  
    read(firstline(1:1), *) n  
    read(firstline(2:2), *) m  

    do i = 1, n  
        character(len=maxm) :: line  
        read(*, '(a)') line  
        ! Process each character in the line  
        do j = 1, m  
            character :: c  
            c = line(j:j)  
            if (c == '-') then  
                ans(i)(j:j) = c  
            else  
                if (mod(i + j, 2) == 1) then  
                    ans(i)(j:j) = 'W'  
                else  
                    ans(i)(j:j) = 'B'  
                end if  
            end if  
        end do  
        ! ensure ans(i) only has first m characters filled  
    end do  

    ! Output  
    do i = 1, n  
        print *, ans(i)(1:m)  
    end do  

end program
